title: Amid uncertainty over U.S. backing, Pentagon chief visits Ukraine
content: The trip comes just two weeks before an election that could determine whether the United States continues its campaign of massive military support.
summary: The trip comes just two weeks before an election that could determine whether the United States continues its campaign of massive military support.

title: Live Briefing: Israeli airstrikes across Lebanon target Hezbollah financial operations
content: Smoke billowed above suburbs of the capital Beirut after Israel urged people to move away from branches of Al-Qard Al-Hasan, a Hezbollah-run financial institution.
summary: Smoke billowed above suburbs of the capital Beirut after Israel urged people to move away from branches of Al-Qard Al-Hasan, a Hezbollah-run financial institution.

title: Analysis: What will Yahya Sinwar’s death mean for Gaza? Not peace.
Fethullah Gulen, Muslim cleric and target of Turkey’s Erdogan, dies at 83
content: Turkish authorities accused him of being the mastermind behind a 2016 coup attempt to topple the government of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
summary: Turkish authorities accused him of being the mastermind behind a 2016 coup attempt to topple the government of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.

title: Australian senator heckles Charles: ‘You are not my king’
content: Indigenous lawmaker Lidia Thorpe was removed from an event at Australia’s Parliament after accusing the British royal family of “genocide” and stealing land.
summary: Indigenous lawmaker Lidia Thorpe was removed from an event at Australia’s Parliament after accusing the British royal family of “genocide” and stealing land.

title: BRICS is key to Putin’s fight against the U.S. Not all members agree.
content: With Putin confident of a Russian victory in Ukraine, this week’s BRICS summit is designed to send a message that Russia is back as a powerful global player.
summary: With Putin confident of a Russian victory in Ukraine, this week’s BRICS summit is designed to send a message that Russia is back as a powerful global player.

title: Iran, weakened by attacks on its allies, braces for Israeli strikes
Propaganda war: Israel, Hamas battle over final images of Yahya Sinwar
What will Yahya Sinwar’s death mean for Gaza? Not peace.
content: A cease-fire and hostage release deal doesn’t look that much more likely in the wake of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar’s death.
summary: A cease-fire and hostage release deal doesn’t look that much more likely in the wake of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar’s death.

title: Israel launches strikes on Hezbollah financial system
content: Explosions rocked Beirut’s southern suburbs and sites near the airport late Sunday after the Israeli military said it would begin targeting Hezbollah finances.
summary: Explosions rocked Beirut’s southern suburbs and sites near the airport late Sunday after the Israeli military said it would begin targeting Hezbollah finances.

title: Propaganda war: Israel, Hamas battle over final images of Yahya Sinwar
content: Israel is trying to portray images of the Hamas leader’s final moments as those of a fugitive. His supporters have seized on the same visuals to glorify him as a fighter.
summary: Israel is trying to portray images of the Hamas leader’s final moments as those of a fugitive. His supporters have seized on the same visuals to glorify him as a fighter.

title: Iran, weakened by attacks on its allies, braces for Israeli strikes
content: Israel plans to strike Iran in retaliation for a ballistic missile attack this month. Iranians fear the response will destabilize the economy and stir unrest.
summary: Israel plans to strike Iran in retaliation for a ballistic missile attack this month. Iranians fear the response will destabilize the economy and stir unrest.

title: Hezbollah and Israeli forces continue to exchange fire
Lebanese Christians, caught in crossfire, refuse to leave war zone
Oxfam condemns killing of water workers amid Gaza’s humanitarian crisis
U.S. and U.N. differ in assessments of current aid levels to Gaza
Israeli strike kills at least 73 people in northern Gaza, medics say
Russia’s opposition abroad is tearing itself apart, but clings to hope
content: Many Russians who want to see change in their country are increasingly doubtful that the opposition in its current form can lead the fight to transform the country.
summary: Many Russians who want to see change in their country are increasingly doubtful that the opposition in its current form can lead the fight to transform the country.

title: Israeli strike kills at least 73 people in northern Gaza, medics say
content: Israel’s military intensified operations there just days after Biden suggested the death of Hamas’s leader could usher in an end to the ruinous war.
summary: Israel’s military intensified operations there just days after Biden suggested the death of Hamas’s leader could usher in an end to the ruinous war.

title: Live Briefing: Drone ‘launched at’ Netanyahu’s home; North Gaza hospitals under fire, officials say
content: A drone was launched from Lebanon toward Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s residence in Caesarea area, officials said, adding that no casualties were reported.
summary: A drone was launched from Lebanon toward Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s residence in Caesarea area, officials said, adding that no casualties were reported.

title: IDF and Hezbollah continue trading attacks
U.S. and U.N. differ in assessments of current aid levels to Gaza
Dog spotted atop ancient Egyptian pyramid delights paragliders
content: Video of the dog went viral after social media users were charmed by footage of it running around and barking at the top of an archeological marvel.
summary: Video of the dog went viral after social media users were charmed by footage of it running around and barking at the top of an archeological marvel.

title: Three killed as hospitals come under fire in northern Gaza, officials say
